short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get instant coupons, cash back & deals at all your favorite online stores.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of overpaying online? Ruby is the ultimate shopping companion that helps you save money effortlessly. It automatically finds and applies the best coupons, promo codes, and cash back offers at all your favorite online stores, right in your browser.
Imagine this: You're about to checkout online, and Ruby pops up with a coupon that saves you 15%. Or you're browsing for a new laptop, and Ruby alerts you to a cash back offer that puts money back in your pocket. That's the power of Ruby!
Here's what you'll love:

* Automatic Savings: No more searching for coupons! Ruby automatically finds and applies the best deals at checkout, so you always get the lowest price.

* Exclusive Coupons & Promo Codes: Access thousands of verified deals from top online retailers.

* Effortless Cash Back: Earn cash back automatically at hundreds of online stores. Simply link your card and shop as usual - Ruby takes care of the rest.

* Price Comparison & Deal Alerts: Never miss a price drop again! Ruby automatically compares prices and notifies you when your favorite items go on sale.

* Personalized Recommendations: Discover new deals tailored to your interests and shopping habits.

Ready to shop smarter and save bigger? Add Ruby to Chrome today and join millions of savvy shoppers who are getting the most out of their money!
